metadata.name: Query Usage To Exfil Data
metadata.comment: Detects usage of "query.exe" a system binary to exfil information such as "sessions" and "processes" for later use

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\query.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('session >')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('process >'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of "query.exe" a system binary to exfil information such as "sessions" and "processes" for later use
